Though epidural analgesia labor find significantly influence peripartum maternal newborn interleukin concentration , study address stage epidural analgesia perform . Healthy ASA I term parturients ( > 37 week ) accept delivery ward want epidural analgesia study . Parturients divide two group : - Group I- painless contraction await augmentation labor . - Group II- parturients cervical dilatation painful labor ( VAS > 5 ) . Parturients Group I give epidural analgesia immediately upon arrival labor ward onset painful contraction ( VAS < 3 ) . Parturients Group 2 give epidural analgesia soon possible .
